questions.question: Vīrabhadra took the head and threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire, offering it as an oblation to the _______.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra then took the head and with great anger threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire, offering it as an oblation.'

questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva were surrounded by the arena of sacrifice, and their bodies appeared to be like those of _______.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Their bodies appeared to be like those of sharks, blackish and yellowish.'

questions.question: The black person was the personified _______ of the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.5 (translation) | QUOTE: 'That black person was the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, and he was prepared to execute the orders of Lord Śiva.'

questions.question: Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested _______ Muni.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested Bhṛgu Muni'

questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva created disturbances in the sacrificial arena, which was arranged by _______.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 (translation) | QUOTE: 'In this way the followers of Lord Śiva devastated all the arrangements for sacrifice of Dakṣa.'

questions.question: The dust storm was conjectured to be possibly caused by the _______ of the planet.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.8 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Is the dissolution of the planet now to occur?'

questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva were equipped with various kinds of _______.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 (translation) | QUOTE: 'They were equipped with various kinds of weapons; their bodies appeared to be like those of sharks, blackish and yellowish.'

questions.question: Vīrabhadra, the black demon, arrested _______ Dakṣa.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 (translation) | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra, the black demon, arrested Prajāpati Dakṣa.'

questions.question: The followers of Lord Śiva departed for their master's abode, _______.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 (translation) | QUOTE: 'They departed for their master's abode, Kailāsa.'

questions.question: The black person was prepared to execute the orders of _______.
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.5 (translation) | QUOTE: 'That black person was the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead, and he was prepared to execute the orders of Lord Śiva.'

meta.query: provide answer from chapter 5 in canto 4 in sb
meta.refined_query:
Here is the refined search query:

`SB 4.5.*`

This query will search for all passages in Chapter 5 of Canto 4 in the Srimad Bhagavatam, which should provide relevant content for creating quiz questions.
